<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Senior Sales Executive]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
 Join an extraordinary team that loves building and delivering industry leading AI solutions. together.  Respage is seeking a Senior Sales Executive who knows the value of digital marketing and what it takes to build strong relationships in the multifamily industry.  
  

  
 Your Role:  Our Senior Sales Executive is responsible for generating new revenue and selling to current customers through a consultative sales process. You must have the ability to identify prospect pain points and articulate the value proposition and ROI of our offering. Your prospects will be Marketing Professionals, Directors, VP’s, and Owners in the Multifamily Industry. 
  

  
 Key Responsibilities: 
  

  

  
+  Achieve thorough understanding of Respage product and service offerings, and the values for constituents of the Multifamily Industry 
  

  
+  Research accounts, identify key players, and generate interest. 
  

  
+  Develop and deliver tailored sales presentations that speaks to Respage’s value proposition 
  

  
+  Manages and updates pipeline activity using CRM 
  

  
+  Responsible for achieving monthly forecasted sales goals  
  

  
+  Build & provide realistic pipeline potential opportunities 
  

  
+  Represent Respage at industry events, trade shows, and client visits 
  

  
+  Grow Revenue through online demonstrations, marketing strategies, and in-person meetings by representing our products and services within your territory. 
  

  

  
 Qualifications: 
  

  

  
+  Demonstrated knowledge and experience in Multifamily Digital Marketing including social media, paid search, social advertising, reputation management, analytics, AI, etc. 
  

  
+  Proven success in prospecting and building business from the ground up in assigned territory 
  

  
+  Established skills in developing existing customer relationships in an effort to expand business 
  

  
+  Successful track record with Multifamily solution-based selling 
  

  
+  Driven to work in a rapidly-evolving and changing environment 
  

  
+  Proven to be a self-starter, independently motivated, team player, and commission driven 
  

  
+  Minimum 5 years of Multifamily Digital Marketing / SAAS sales experience 
  

  
+  Solid experience and relationships in the Multifamily Industry. 
  

  

  
 What We offer  Our aggressive compensation package includes a competitive base salary, performance-based uncapped commission plan, paid time off, medical insurance, 401(K) with matching, and profit sharing. Our company is completely virtual.  You will be based out of your home office with essential equipment provided to you.  
  

  
 About Us  The leading provider of AI-driven apartment marketing services nationwide, Respage has partnered with property management companies for over 18 years to create extraordinary renting results. The company’s comprehensive portfolio addresses the full life cycle of today’s renter, demonstrating tangible results that maximize ROI. Solutions deliver more qualified leads, nurture prospects, boost online reputation and star ratings, improve resident satisfaction, and generate more leases. The company's foundation is its extraordinary team - Respage is continually recognized as a Best Place to Work in the Multifamily industry. 
  

  
 
  

  
Powered by JazzHR

    </job>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Account Manager]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
 Respage seeks an Account Manager to join our 19-year-old, award-winning digital technology company.  
  

  
 Are you a customer service-centric professional with experience managing projects in a client-facing role and being a part of a team?  Here’s your chance to work with a company that was named as one of the Best Places to Work in Philadelphia by the Philadelphia Business Journal and was listed in the Inc 5000 list of fastest growing businesses in 2021. 
  

  
 Respage is a leading provider of technology-driven marketing solutions for the multifamily industry. The successful candidate will join an established team and nurture relationships with a portfolio of clients.  
  

  
 You will work under the direction of the Director of Operations and in coordination with a team of Senior Account Managers. You will be totally responsible for the customer experience of all Respage products from initial on boarding after a sale is received until the moment the client is off boarded. You will be the go-to resource for your client portfolio and work very closely with other departments to ensure we are delivering the best experience to our clients of the Respage suite of products. 
  

  
 We are looking for someone who: 
  

  

  
+  Is highly organized, detail-oriented, and serious about organization and processes. 
  

  
+  Is extremely dependable and solutions oriented 
  

  
+  Is a critical thinker and problem solver. 
  

  
+  Is able to lead a project and delegate to others 
  

  
+  Demonstrates experience with change management 
  

  
+  Has a background in agile (and other) project management methodologies/tools  
  

  

  
 Skills 
  

  

  
+  Proven track record of success in managing enterprise-wide projects 
  

  
+  ​Strong organizational skills 
  

  
+  Leadership, teamwork, and client management experience. 
  

  
+  Demonstrated proficiency in database structure, analysis, systems integration and management 
  

  
+  CRM proficiency  
  

  
+  Experience working with marketing technology products  
  

  
+  Excellent communication skills, particularly in a remote environment that relies on communication via phone, webinar, email, IM, etc. 
  

  
+  Proven success working independently in a fast-paced work environment 
  

  
+  Able to work as a part of a team to complete a project successfully and on time 
  

  
+  Willingness to roll up sleeves to take on any issues that the team needs assistance with 
  

  

  
 Our Ideal Candidate 
  

  

  
+  Prefers working remotely and without direct supervision, and has successful experience working from home 
  

  
+  Is passionate and driven and eager to learn and grow 
  

  
+  Takes great pride in the work that they're performing 
  

  
+  Believes that delivering a fully executed, successful product to the client is the goal 
  

  
+  Is forward thinking and can take our current processes to the next level 
  

  
+  Is comfortable in a work environment that frequently changes to address changes in digital marketing or to improve the product being delivered 
  

  
+  Bachelor's Degree 
  

  
+  3+ years project management experience 
  

  

  
 
  

  
 Compensation & Benefits 
  

  
 
  

  

  
+  Our best perk is we are and have always been a distributed team so you get to work from your home office even after COVID. You must live in the Greater Philadelphia area. 
  

  
+  Our competitive compensation package includes a base salary, phone and internet allowance, PTO, healthcare, profit sharing, and 401K with generous match.  
  

  
+  Salary: Competitive, depending on experience

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Content Specialist]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
 Are you a customer service-centric professional with experience in a content operations role and love being a part of a team?  Here’s your chance to work with a company that was named as one of the Best Places to Work in Philadelphia by the Philadelphia Business Journal and was listed in the Inc 5000 list of fastest-growing businesses in 2021. 
  

  
 Respage is a leading provider of technology-driven marketing solutions for the multifamily industry. The successful candidate will join an established team and nurture relationships with a portfolio of clients.  
  

  
 You will work under the direction of the Content Operations Manager. You will be totally responsible for the customer experience of all Respage content.   You will be the go-to resource for our freelancers and work very closely with other departments to ensure we are delivering the best experience to our clients of the Respage content products. 
  

  
 We are seeking a versatile Content Specialist to join our content department.  In this role, a strong combination of content and operation skills is needed as our small team currently produces over 5000 pieces of content monthly for our clients. These pieces i
